name: Slipman
description:
I would like to introduce you to my adventure game: SLIPMAN.

It's a point & click, an adventure game like the acclaimed 90's genre references, "Day of the Tentacle", "Monkey Island", "Broken Sword", "Leisure Suit Larry", etc.

A simple pitch: a guy locked out of his apartment, in underwear.
He has to find a way back into his home, by exploring the different floors of his building.

I'm creating the game with the Visionaire engine, which is a great tool for adventure games fans.

See the teaser here: https://vimeo.com/128598072

thank you.

WARNING : FRENCH VERSION

I'm actually looking for translators to translate the game from french to english, if you are interested for this, please contact me at: ratier.mathieu@gmail.com
